quiz.text: India’s first ever Permanent Aadhaar Enrolment Centre (PAEC) has been inaugurated recently (July 2023) at ________, it will facilitate Aadhaar related services (enrolment and updation) for tri-services personnel (Defence & civil) and their dependents through their Field Post Offices (FPO) in 48 identified locations in India.
options: New Delhi
Indore
Srinagar
Itanagar
None of the above

quiz.text: The AIC initiative is part of the Atal Innovation Mission, which seeks to encourage a culture of innovation and entrepreneurship across various sectors in the country. Recently (July 2023) the _______ has secured a grant of ₹10 crore from _______to establish India’s first Atal Incubation Centre (AIC) in fisheries.
options: The Kerala University of Fisheries and Ocean Studies, National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC)
Indian National Centre for Ocean Information Services, NITI Aayog
The Kerala University of Fisheries and Ocean Studies, NITI Aayog
Chennai Marine University, National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC)
Indian National Centre for Ocean Information Services, Department of Fisheries

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023) S Phangnon Konyak, an MP from the _______, became the first woman from ________ to preside over the Rajya Sabha. House Chairman Jagdeep Dhankhar had nominated her and three other women members to the panel of vice-chairpersons.
options: BJP, Mizoram
NCP, Assam
BJP, Nagaland
BJD, Nagaland
BJP, Manipur

quiz.text: Presently, Esports gaming in India is experiencing a significant upsurge. Based on a recent analysis, the esports industry is projected to grow fourfold and attain INR 1,100 crore by 2025. Recognizing India as a potential market for the future, _______ is set to launch first India’s first online gaming academy to provide the young Esports player an opportunity and platform to advance to a professional level.
options: Kerala
Telangana
Andhra Pradesh
Punjab
Madhya Pradesh

quiz.text: To elevate its delivery services, enhance customer convenience, strengthen its ties with local businesses, and continue its relentless expansion in the dynamic Indian market, _______ has unveiled its first-ever floating store on the tranquil Dal Lake in Srinagar, Kashmir, as part of the innovative "________" last-mile delivery initiative.
options: Amazon India, I Have Space
Amazon India, I Have Market
eBay, I Have Market
Flipkart India, I Have Space
None of the above

quiz.text: “Speak Up!” portal has been seen in the news recently (July 2023). It has been launched to -
options: Prevent Corruption in government contracts.
Prevent Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace.
Report Child Labour.
Report drug abuse or doping activities in sports.
Promote innovative ideas by the citizens.

quiz.text: Prime Minister Narendra Modi recently (July 2023) inaugurated the state-of-the-art International Exhibition-cum-Convention Centre (IECC) complex. With a campus area of 123 acres and top-notch facilities, it is India's largest MICE (Meetings, Incentives, Conferences, and Exhibitions) destination and will host the upcoming G20 summit. Inspired by ‘Anubhav Mandapam’ of Bhagwan Basaveshwara, IECC is named as ‘Bharat Mandapam’ and it is located at-
options: BKC, Mumbai
GIFT City, Ahmadabad
Pragati Maidan, New Delhi
Kempegowda Commercial Arcade, Bengaluru
None of the above.

quiz.text: Recently Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated the _______ edition of Semicon India, in Gandhinagar, Gujarat. At this conference MoU was signed between the Centre for Nano Science and Engineering (CeNSE) at the _______ and Lam Research India to jointly develop a customized course offering for Indian universities to teach semiconductor fabrication technology.
options: second, IIT Madras
second, IISc Bengaluru
first, IIT Delhi
first, IIT Bombay
third, IIT Gandhinagar

quiz.text: Recently a book titled, “Mental Health: Concern for All – In Context of the Mental Healthcare Act, 2017’ and a report on “Status of Implementation of the Mental Healthcare Act, 2017” were released during National Conference on ‘Moving Mental Health Beyond Institutions’ held in Delhi. This conference was organised by ________.
options: National Institute of Mental Health and Neuro-Sciences, Bengaluru
The National Human Rights Commission of India
Vidyasagar Institute of Mental Health and Neuro and Allied Sciences, Bhopal
Central Institute of Psychiatry, Ranchi
Mental Health Institute, Chandigarh

quiz.text: India is all set to become energy independent by 2047 and achieving net zero by 2070. The market size of the Chemical and Petrochemical sector is around USD 190 billion and is likely to reach USD 300 billion by 2025 and USD 1 trillion by 2040. In this regard, 3rd Summit on Global Chemicals & Petrochemicals Manufacturing hubs in India was organised at _______.
options: Bombay High
Haldia
Delhi
Calcutta
None of the above.

quiz.text: With respect MoUs and agreements seen in the news recently, which of the following is correct?
options: Agreement for the Enhancing Connectivity and Sustainability in Bihar Roads Project - World Bank and the Government of India (GOI)
Partnership to Co-Create State-of-the - Art Digital Business Platform - Bank of India & IBM India Pvt Ltd
Co-lending partnership agreement - Chennai based NBFC Dvara KGFS and HDFC Bank
To transform state it is - Chhattisgarh government and Ford India
None of the above.

quiz.text: With the aim to use AI technologies in warship construction and for military equipment, Goa Shipyard Limited (GSL) and ________ have signed MoU recently (July 2023).
options: IIT Bombay
IIT Madras
MIT, USA
BITS, Pilani
None of the above.

quiz.text: Thyssenkrupp Marine Systems (TMS), the Germany-based leading naval company, has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Indian defence PSU Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders Limited (MDL) for the overhaul and modernization of submarine _______ to extend its operational capability.
options: INS Shivalik
INS Shankush
INS SHISHUMAR
INS Kamorta
INS Talwar

quiz.text: In an effort to empower small businesses across the country, _______ and Meta are expanding their ‘WhatsApp Se Wyapaar’ program to digitally train and upskill 10 million local traders on the WhatsApp Business App. The partnership’s goal is to localize digitization efforts to unleash growth opportunities for businesses with hyper-local digital trainings in 11 Indian languages across all 29 Indian states.
options: Confederation of Indian Industry (CII)
Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry (FICCI)
The Associated Chambers of Commerce and Industry of India (ASSOCHAM)
National Association of Software and Service Companies (NASSCOM)
Confederation of All India Traders (CAIT)

quiz.text: With respect MoUs and agreements seen in the news recently, which of the following is incorrect?
options: MoU to develop the infrastructure of Bengaluru - Karnataka Government with Canada-based World Design Organization (WDO)
MoU to foster advancements in AI & Emerging Technologies - ‘India AI’ (an IBD under Digital India Corporation) and Meta
For the implementation Quick Impact Projects - India and Lao People's Democratic Republic
MoU to develop indigenous conversational AI solutions - Bharat Electronics Limited (BEL) & CoRover Private Limited
Contract for installation of computer-based interlocking signaling system – India and China

quiz.text: With respect to days in the news, which of the following is incorrect?
options: Kargil Vijay Diwas - 25 July
World Hepatitis Day - 28 July
World In Vitro Fertilization (IVF) Day or World Embryologist Day - 25 July
CRPF 85th Raising Day - 27 July
International Day for the Conservation of the Mangrove Ecosystem - 26 July

quiz.text: With respect to days in the news, which of the following is correct?
options: World Nature Conservation Day - July 28
International Tiger Day - July 29
International Day of Friendship - July 30
World Day Against Trafficking in Persons – July 30
All of the above

quiz.text: With respect to UNESCO’s World Heritage sites (WHS) in the India, which following statement is incorrect?
options: Currently, India has 40 Sites in the UNESCO World Heritage List.
The first sites to be listed were the Ajanta Caves, Ellora Caves, Agra Fort, and Taj Mahal, all of which were inscribed in the 1983.
The most recent site listed was Jaipur City, in 2021.
The Chandigarh Capitol Complex by Franco-Swiss architect Le Corbusier is the transnational WHS site.
The Khangchendzonga National Park, is of mixed type WHS.

quiz.text: AS 9100D Aerospace is the benchmark for ensuring exceptional quality in aviation, space, and defense manufacturing and supply chain processes. Recently, _______ has achieved this special certification which is awarded by the Society of Automotive Engineers and the European Association of Aerospace Industries.
options: TATA Motors
TATA Steel
DRDO
Jindal Aluminum Ltd
Hero MotoCorp

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), the Union Ministry of Youth Affairs & Sports has decided to recognize the ______ as National Sports Federation (NSF).
options: The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI)
Handball Association of India (HAI)
Hockey Association of India (HAI)
Wrestling Federation of India (WFI)
None of the above.

quiz.text: Recently, the yearly Machail Mata Yatra began as numerous devotees gathered to pay their respects at the high-altitude temple located in the Kishtwar district of _______.
options: Sikkim
Uttarakhand
Himachal Pradesh
Jammu and Kashmir.
Ladakh

quiz.text: Director General of Railway Protection Force (RPF), unveiled the recently (JULY 2023) constructed National Martyr’s Memorial and National Museum for Railway Security at Jagjivan RPF Academy, _______.
options: Lucknow
Jaipur
Kanpur
Gandhinagar
None of the above.

quiz.text: _______ is an English translation of the Tamil book ‘Ninaivugalukku Maranamillai’ authored by DR. Y S Rajan and Dr. APJM Nasima Maraikayar. It is translated by Sripriya Srinivasan. It covers the beautiful history of Indian rocketry, precursors to today’s Science and Technology, the workings of the Indian political and administrative system.
options: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam: Memories Never Die
India 2020
Ignited Minds
Wings of Fire
Turning Points

quiz.text: ______ is the Memoir of Ranjit Pratap. The book was released by Former Vice-President M. Venkaiah Naidu on the occasion of Diamond Jubilee celebrations of Rayala Corporation.
options: As the wheel turns
Dharmachakra
Journey from employee to manager.
As the wheel rotate
None of the above

quiz.text: With respect to personalities seen in the news recently which of the following is incorrect?
options: Lahiru Thirimanne - Sri Lankan Cricketer
Milan Kundera - Czech-French author
Shirish Kanekar - Marathi journalist-author-columnist
Aditya S Samant – Poet and Author
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is incorrect?
options: English cricketer Stuart Broad recently announced retirement from cricket after Ashes 2023.
Stuart Broad recently became the first pace bowler to take 600 wickets in Test cricket.
Stuart Broad had reached this milestone during the fourth Test of Ashes 2023 at Old Trafford.
All of the above
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023) concluded Talisman Sabre joint military exercise is the largest combined training activity between the _________ and the ________. This exercise is held every two years. India, Philippines, Singapore and Thailand took part as observer countries in this exercise.
options: USA, Japan
USA, Australia
Australia, Japan
Japan, Russia
UK, USA

quiz.text: Under Support for Prototype and Research Kickstart (Spark) Initiative of Innovations for Defense Excellence (iDEX), Bengaluru-based Spacetech startup ______ has received grants from the Ministry of Defence to manufacture miniaturised multi-payload satellites for the Indian Air Force (IAF).
options: Pixxel
Skyroot Aerospace
SpaceIN
Satcom
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023) joint expedition of ocean scientists from India, ______ and Mauritius was organized by the Indian National Centre for Ocean Information Services (INCOIS), Ministry of Earth Sciences under the regional framework of Colombo Security Conclave (CSC). It was the first of its kind initiative under the CSC framework.
options: Bhutan
China
Russia
Sri Lanka
Bangladesh

quiz.text: Recently scientists have discovered droplets of water trapped in mineral deposits in the Himalayas that were likely left behind from an ancient ocean which existed around 600 million years ago. This discovery was made by Scientists of _______ and Niigata University, Japan.
options: IIT, Gandhinagar
INCOIS, Hyderabad
IIT Madras
Indian Institute of Science (IISc)
None of the above

quiz.text: With respect to winners of the recent sports tournaments, identify the incorrect one.
options: Tampere Open 2023 - Sumit Nagal

2023 ACC Emerging Teams Asia Cup - India

options: Jim Skea

John Smith

options: Aditya S Samant

quiz.text: Udyog Ratna Award is conferred by the Maharashtra Government to individuals who have made outstanding contributions to the industrial sector of Maharashtra. Recently, ______ became the first recipient of this award.
options: Syrus Poonawala
Rahul Bajaj
Ratan Tata
Aditya Birla
None of the above

quiz.text: NRE Eve+ is an exclusive Non-Resident (NR) savings account scheme, specifically curated for Non-Resident Indian (NRI) women. It was launched by _______ on the occasion of the start of the FIFA Women’s World Cup.
options: RBI
